args.name: address
args.desc: The address to use for the abstracted account. If zeroAddress, then the address of the contract account will be used

methods.name: verifyAppAuthAddr
methods.desc: Verify the abstracted account address is rekeyed to this app

methods.name: rekeyTo
methods.desc: Rekey the address to another account. Primarily useful for rekeying to an EOA

args.name: flash
args.desc: Whether or not this should be a flash rekey. If true, the rekey back to the address must done in the same txn group as this call

methods.name: rekeyToPlugin
methods.desc: Temporarily rekey to an approved plugin app address

methods.name: changeAdmin
methods.desc: Change the admin for this app

methods.name: addPlugin
methods.desc: Add an app to the list of approved plugins

methods.name: removePlugin
methods.desc: Remove an app from the list of approved plugins
